00045 class CGIApp{
00046         public:
00047                 typedef void (CGIApp::*callback)(void);
00048         private:
00049                 string mSegment;
00050                 int segmentCount;
00051                 typedef map<std::string, callback> callbackMap;
00052                 callbackMap clbk;
00053                 bool callRoute(const string& urlPath);
00054                 string detectRoute() const;
00055         public:
00056                 int getSegmentCount() const;
00057         public:
00058                 void setRoute(const string& urlpath, callback fn);
00059                 bool routeExists(const string& urlPath) const;
00060                 bool removeRoute(const string& urlPath);
00061                 Var segment(unsigned int n, bool concat=false, bool fromRoot=false) const;
00062         public:
00063                 Session session;
00064                 Request request;
00065                 HttpHeader header;
00066         protected:
00067                 mutable stringstream res;
00068         public:
00069                 CGIApp();
00070                 CGIApp(CGILayout* l);
00071                 ~CGIApp();
00072                 void start();
00073                 virtual void init();
00074                 virtual void subMain() = 0;
00075                 virtual void destroy();
00076                 void stop();
00077                 int exec();
00078         public:
00079                 auto_ptr<CGILayout> layout;
00080         public:
00081                 void setLayout(CGILayout* l);
00082 };
